chapter.title: Registration
chapter.para: To be able to use the Cloud Area Padovana service, first of all you need to apply for an account. The procedure to be followed is described in this chapter.

section.title: Registration in the pre-production service
section.para: To get an account on the pre-production service please send your request to: cloud-support@lists.pd.infn.it

In your request please specify:
Your name and family name
The experiment(s)/group(s) you are affiliated with

section.title: Apply for an account
section.para: The registration procedure in the production service is managed through the Horizon Openstack web service interface.
Go to https://cloud-areapd.\ pd.infn.it/dashboard in a browser. The following page should appear:

If you already have an account on the INFN Authenticaton and Authorization Infrastructure (INFN AAI) and therefore you have access to the INFN portal, click on the left icon (INFN AAI). Once logged, click on the Register button xxx.
